The current market capitalisation stands at Rs 40.25 crore. The company management includes C Shivakumar Reddy - Chairman & Managing Director, R H Kasturi - Director - Operations, L R Venugopal - Independent Director, B S Shankarnarayan - Independent Director. It is listed on the BSE with a BSE Code of 590041 and the NSE with an NSE Code of KAVVERITEL.
